Class ServerStub

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Distributed.Middleware.ServerStub
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerStub extends Object implements Server, Serializable
Class representing the server in socket connections.
